title: New: Geneva Miller – The Apple Tree
body: This new track from California’s **Geneva Miller** is dreamfolk personified. Languid synths, floaty vocals and a lightly picked guitar make up the majority of _The Apple Tree_, a song that almost appears to consist of one long chorus, yet a sparklingly good one at that. The repetitive line “_leave me be, underneath the apple tree_” features numerous times throughout the track, yet is intoxicatingly addictive. Check out _The Apple Tree_ below. The Apple Tree by Geneva Miller
